title: On such a night
brief_description: A visit to Glyndebourne opera by a young American. Intrigued by a group of people in evening dress at Victoria Station, he follows them to Glyndebourne and learns of this centre of opera in an historic country house. Shows excerpts from a performance of Mozart’s The Marriage of Figaro with the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra.
